website_summaries.verdict: The best general electric mower from Sun Joe with enough power for medium-sized yards.
pros: Included bag holds a large amount of trimmings before needing to reload
Battery is detachable and can be swapped out for continuous use or charging if necessary
Compact design is ideal for small yards
cons: Can struggle to adequately cover larger yards without taking a lot of time to cut

customer_reviews.title: Dies after about 18 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was electric and no gas to worry about. After the first use discovered I needed a second battery to do my whole yard. Thereafter discovered the downside of all the wear-parts being plastic: After a few uses the blade started coming loose from its plastic holder. The vibrations from the loose blade causes the battery clip which is also plastic to wear out. Now even duct-tape isn't enough to hold the battery in place and keep it running.
customer_reviews.author: John Pavka

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with bent wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Well, what is going on with Amazon? Seems a lot of things ordered from them are just 'not right'. The front right wheel of this mower is bent in on top and out to the front side. It leaves the mower pulling to the right and does not allow for the height adjustment to be raised beyond the 3 level, otherwise it is against the mower body and unable to rotate. This is just ridiclous, how did it make it out of the factory in this condition. Unusable! Take it back, i'll shop locally.
customer_reviews.author: rivrrunner2006

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After a year of owning it, it simply stopped working. It won’t turn on even though the battery is showing full charge. I tried to change the blade hoping it was a balance issue, nope. Biggest waste of money ever.
customer_reviews.author: Aerie

customer_reviews.title: it won't last over a year.
customer_reviews.text: Using this lawn mower on a once a month average, it just simply will NOT turn on after just 11 months of use,the battery shows a full charge. The lawn mower was always stored on the garage, to keep it from rusting or damaging any of the electronic components, from the outside looks almost brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Item was dead on arrival, but I had no way to know that until I took an hour out of my life to unpack and assemble it. There was no customer service contact information available. It had to be disassembled, repacked, and returned because there was no option available to exchange it. Very disappointed. I know the most helpful reviews focus on features, but in this case the only feature worth noting is: it doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Battery only lasted 20 minutes on a full charge, I don't know why it has a bag because there was grass all over my yard and when the bag did get full the tab never closed to tell me. Update: I have had the mower for a couple of months, it stalls all the time, takes all day to mow because I have to keep charging the battery don't walk run away from this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died After Three Uses
customer_reviews.text: I was initially happy with this mower, but it died after only three uses, only twenty minutes each. The battery shows a full charge, but the mower will not start. It is dead as a door nail. All instructions were carefully followed. Thankfully, Amazon is initiating a return. Amazon is great. The mower is not. The price seemed to good to be true, and I now feel like I should have paid more attention to the bad reviews. I suspect the electronics in this mower are just too sensitive to be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: SCT

customer_reviews.title: Bent wheel right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Bent wheels right out of the box, one so bad, it doesn't even touch the ground. Took forever to get here and damaged right out of the box. Obviously their quality assurance is terrible. Mower will cut for about twenty seconds and then die. Yes, the battery was fully charged. I believe it's because one of the wheels is so crooked it doesn't touch the ground and causes the blade to be uneven, but I am by far from a expert. I'll never order another product from this company again. Requesting a refund the day after I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuehnau

customer_reviews.title: good rechargeable mower
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this mower for almost a year and it works very well for me. I'm 5'1" and found it difficult to use a regular gas mower, so I researched lawn mowers like crazy and found this one. The battery charges pretty quickly. I get a good hour of use before the battery drains. It is relatively light weight, which is good because then I can maneuver it around my yard easily. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Riley

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Check Blade Tightness before each use!
customer_reviews.text: The blade of my mower wobbled loose and shot off while using it. Thank God it didn't hit my leg! There should be built into the mower some safety feature that prevents the blade from shooting off. More than one nut, a bolt, SOMETHING. I'm very upset with how dangerous this is. I will continue to use it with caution, but I will never let anyone else use this mower out of concern for their safety.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small yards and limited storage NOTE ON STARTING
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for my small backyard and side yards in my Chicago home. I can easily cut all the grass in 15 minutes with one bag full. If you hve a bigger yard, this may not be your thing. One note on starting: you have to VERY SPECIFICALLY press the button first, then the handle, and then wait two seconds. It's easier to grab the handle and then press the button, but that will not work. Also, make sure the safety key is in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Wagg

customer_reviews.title: It isn’t good, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a very small lawn and in no rush to mow it, this is the mower for you. I have used this mower for about a year now, and it does the job, but that’s about it. You won’t win any mowing awards and the battery will likely be drained by the time you’re done with a small lawn. First thing to do in my opinion is get rid of the bag, put that plastic insert they offer into the mower chute, and a mulching blade. At least in that way you won’t have to hassle with the very small bag filling up constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cox

customer_reviews.title: Warped, can't be assembled
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions say it arrives with the lower handle attached. It was not attached and the plastic parts to attach it were warped so the handle could not be securely attached. Never used it, returning it which is a pain because it's a heavy box.
customer_reviews.author: TMZ505F

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold on  electric lawnmowers now.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting a battery powered lawn mower but I'm glad I got it. It was a bit difficult to put together and there is a tiny learning curve to start it rather than your traditional lawn mower. But once you get it together and going it's quite impressive. Its very light but strong. One battery charge made it for my whole front yard which is pretty big. It took down some huge weeds that had grown in my yard. One was even a good 6-8 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: CheyNickole

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, strong & even mow! Bought a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a lightweight and non-gas mower. I’ve had this same mower for one year now. Was easy to assemble since you only need to attach the handles - 5 minutes. It’s super quiet, surprisingly strong, so easy to use and cuts evenly. My neighbors always comment on how nice and even our yard looks after a mow. Since it’s been working great for a year, we decided to buy a 2nd one (one for front/back). Love the rechargeable battery! So nice not having to use and smell the gas and oil that we used to for so many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Totally bummed. Got the battery charged and the entire thing put together and it would not start. Got a lemon. Trying a different brand of electric mower and hoping for better results.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: Used to be much cheaper and battery costed $25
customer_reviews.text: Now the battery costs $90 when on sale. It's ridiculous. It's like when you would buy a printer for a low price only to find out the cartridges were super expensive. unless your yard is 20x20, you'll need 2 batteries. A. it's not good for a battery to drain all the way B. it just doesn't last that long, which I am fine with, if a 2nd battery was reasonably priced. It does NOT cost more than $25 to manufacture that little battery.
customer_reviews.author: int123

customer_reviews.title: Love this mower!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this mower. Quiet, powerful, and when you use the bag, the bottom of the mower stays clean. The charge holds really well for my small lawn, and I can go 2 mowings before recharging. I actually bought the "Classic Accessories 71992 Veranda Rectangular Patio Ottoman/Side Table Cover, Small", to cover it, which fits perfectly with the handle folded down and the grass bag placed on top. I have it chained to my deck support post when not in use. Love the fact that there are no cords to run over and no gas to deal with. Very happy ......... :)
customer_reviews.author: Louis in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off continually
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first two times we used it on our very small yard, then (on a full charge) kept on turning off, then restart, then off again like 15 times! Recharged battery, same thing again! Had height adjustment at 6 on very thin (easy to mow) grass. Too bad, as I had high hopes for a cordless mower. Anyone know of a brand that works longer than two mows?
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Most Regrettable Purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: After only 6-8 cuts, the machine simply stopped working. The machine is still under the 2 year warranty. I verified that the battery is all fine and followed all the instruction to try and get it back to order, but not working anymore. It appears starter mechanism is weak. The blade makes harsh/blunt chops to the grass leaving it butchered vs smooth. Any attempts to contact Sun Joe to get answers to these feedback items were never returned. Overaall, steer away from this product, much much alternatives out there
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Good for small lawns
customer_reviews.text: My lawn is around 25 sq ft. This machine works alright at a medium level. Ideally, I'd like to cut it as short as possible but the wattage will not support that type of power. If you're in a condo with a smaller lawn, it's perfect. Ideally, I'd go for the stronger lawn mower (i think 100w) but that one is pretty expensive. Battery life is good. It'll cut all 25 sq ft with roughly 30% life (there's a battery gauge). Overall, it works. It folds to minimize space. I'd just like for it to have more power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little mower. Exceeded My expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mower. I live in a end unit town home so I have a postage stamp in the front, but I do have quite a bit of side yard and a good back yard that needed to be cut. I wanted something small and definitely did not want to mess with a gas mower or electrical cords. The power this thing has was surprising all while remaining very quiet. Cuts through tall grass with no problems and is very simple to use. Assembly was simple. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: April Ballenger

customer_reviews.title: great mower
customer_reviews.text: I am almost 70 and my deceased husband's gas powered, self propelled mower was just too much. I bought this one and I am ever so thankful I did. Its easy to push around and does a great job mowing and sucking up leaves. The only negative is the bag is small but if it was larger it might be too much for someone like me to handle. I have a very large back yard and it does it all on one charge. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  Get it.
customer_reviews.text: This mower is AWESOME! I am a disabled, middle aged female who had an open heart surgery on September of 2019. I needed to get a mower that was light and easy to push...this mower is it! I have 1/2 acre and my grass was at least 8-12 inches high throughout my yard; this mower was able to cut on level 5 without bogging down. I work my yard in sections over a period of a week. I had to empty the grass catcher often, but that was expected due to grass height. I even cut my grass wet!
customer_reviews.author: wanda martinez

customer_reviews.title: Had to return. Unit did not operate
customer_reviews.text: I gave this unit 2 stars because I am hoping this was just an anomaly. Lawn Mower was delivered quickly and as advertised. Instructions were almost useless. I received 2 sets of instructions in French, 1 in Spanish. I am not fluent in either. Using the pictures, it was easy enough to figure out how to assemble and I looked up the manual online. After charging the battery and putting the unit together all per instructions, the unit did not operate. We did troubleshoot, but still no luck. We put everything back in the box and returned. Ended up buying a corded model (which is what I was trying to avoid).
customer_reviews.author: P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about getting a battery mower, but at 68 I grew tired of the hassle of a gas mower, and in my location people want a fortune to mow for me. My yard isn't a manicured city lot, it's a country bumpy yard with weeds and rocks. This mower is very lightweight, easy to maneuver and made my mowing a breeze. It even cut 2 foot high weeds with no problems at all. Battery lasted 45 minutes and recharges in 3 hours or so. I'm very impressed and happy I purchased this mower.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Adams

customer_reviews.title: Who Knew ..
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this lawn mower and the extra battery (If your lawn takes more than 45 minutes to mow get an extra battery) I have a much better way to mow my lawn. Nothing really exciting here, just works good, very inexpensive (price a Honda or Briggs with the same specs) and is so light and maneuverable I don't feel as tired as I used to afterwards. I bought this because I was so happy with the SnowJoe snowblower I have. Now I am double impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Crow

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY DO NOT BUY THIS MOWER. We just purchased this barely over a month ago and it has already completely stopped working!!!! The motor is broken and the battery life is only 20 minutes. We tried contacting SunJoe support and they are absolutely terrible. Customer service was rude and not helpful. We are just barely past the return policy for amazon so we are now out $240 from this mower and have to now buy a new one when this one is barely a month old. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good product, lousy service
customer_reviews.text: Great mower, but hope you never need support. I make allowances for COVID-19, but over 2 weeks to get a replacement battery charger is a bit much. I even got a survey before the resolution of the issue. That's not a good way to get a good review.
customer_reviews.author: SeanC

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have a "normal" front yard and small back yard. My gas powered was slowly breaking down and rather than pay for a tune-up clean up repair I decided to consider my increasing difficulty after decades of yanking that rope to start gas mowers and looked for something easier. This went together easily, had all the parts and instructions. After charging the battery it started like a charm. Love the bag feature, dump clippings right into yard waste bag or can. It's quiet so I can mow early in the a.m. without disturbing my neighbors and takes up less space in my garage. Very easy height adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 summer uses on small lawn.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only 1 full year and 4 months on normal use (purchase May 2019). Kept in garage every winter with my snow joe. Only used it for 2 summers. Own 2 batteries that are well charged and kept in room temperature all the time, except in mower when mowing outside for short periods of time because my law. Is very small. Unfortunately the return window has closed. Sad. Really liked the idea behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but materials are a bit on the cheap side
customer_reviews.text: This mower is pretty sweet. It's light and maneuverable. Can easily be picked up by the handle. Battery lasts a long time. It's quiet. It does feel a little bit cheap though, the wheels seem pretty wimpy and the back doesn't sit quite right. Concerned about durability. Hopefully it holds up because it's pretty expensive. For now it's serving my needs though.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can deal with the tradeoffs
customer_reviews.text: I HATE pulling the little ripcord on regular mowers. That’s 99% of why I bought this thing. It mows well enough if you’re keeping on top of your yard work. My grass had grown for a month and this mower couldn’t keep up. Also I guess I have a larger yard than I realize because the battery died about 4/5ths of the way through my mowing session. I recharged the battery as long as it took to drink a couple of beers and it was good enough to polish off the job. Speaking of batteries, we are dealing with a razor model here. I got the mower on sale for $190 and replacement batteries are $180...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny V

customer_reviews.title: Works well....only drawback is the battery life.
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower is easy to use, light weight and on the quieter side in terms of its motor.... It works well and doesn't lose power as the battery is draining. That said, it's only draw back is the battery life. On a full charge I may get 30 mins of use before it needs recharging. I have about 7000sq feet of grass and if I hustle I can usually only get through half of it on one charge. Wish it came with a second spare battery... that said, I know they sell spare batteries but I find it frustrating that purchasing a spare battery will cost almost the same as a new unit with a battery....
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Great for small yards
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. But it’s small, light duty. My yard is probably only 1000 square feet. If you have a huge lawn, or wait till the grass is pretty long, this is not the tool for you. Almost looks like a kids toy, and appears cheaply made, but actually works pretty good. Took me about 15 minutes to mow, and there was still half battery life left. Can’t comment on longevity of mower. Just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Griesshaber

customer_reviews.title: My second battery mower
customer_reviews.text: I have used another battery mower for 12 years and thr batterys are failing so bought this mower. Has more power, 2* wider and the ion battery delivers morre power. After about 6 weeks of use the handle cussion fell off. Bummer...
customer_reviews.author: Dogbark

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate this cordless lawnmower! It works great for my little “spoonful” of yard! The battery didn’t die during the time that I used it. I love the blade levels that can be adjusted. Parts of my yard has patches of grass that are missing, so the lawnmower digs into those holes and it makes it tough to push over those areas. Overall, I am happy with this item and I would recommend it to anyone who has small yards.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Would not work.  Never came on.
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked that it actually worked.. It seemed to be perfect for my needs lightweight, no cord. However, it would not come on, and the charger indicated that the battery was fully charged. I tried reinserting the battery, but it never worked. I was going to replace it, hoping the next one would work, then changed my mind. Don't want the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: LacelleTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mower
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this lawnmower. I own three other SunJoe products. All of them are great but this mower is amazing. It's very lightweight. I have had a stroke so my strength is very limited. I use the mowing as physical therapy. We do have a small yard so it only takes 20 minutes to mow. I set the mower on the lowest cut setting and it cuts beautifully. I can maneuver close to steps and trees. It's very quiet and I can mow in the morning and not wake my neighbors. I recommend this mower to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ford

customer_reviews.title: I love this little mower!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light weight mower that was easy to maneuver. I have some small areas of grass that are between flower beds which make them difficult to mow with a bigger, heavier mower. I wouldn't recommend this for a large yard but for smaller areas it works great. I wouldn't recommend this for heavy duty mowing. We have a gas powered bigger/heavier mower for the large/tough areas of the yard. Love the convenience of a cordless electric mower and it does a really nice job of cutting the grass. Very easy to adjust the height. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: charlie524

customer_reviews.title: well put together,run time is impressive
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the overall operation of this mower!! I have been using it for about a month already,and so far it hasn't missed a beat!! The cut is very smooth,the grass catcher is small but the window that is provided is very helpful in letting you know it is time to empty!It is easy to store,and it cleans up easily! Should have done this last year!!! I would recommend it to anyone who is tired with messing around with the conventional gas push mower! And it is much quieter as well!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bioski

customer_reviews.title: Not overly happy with mower in spite of good reviews
customer_reviews.text: Even though after much research I found this mower and the reviews were good, I feel that it is a piece of junk and very difficult for me to operate. I bought it because I’m on oxygen and needed something very light weight to mow the ditches. But it just feels like a cheap piece of junk. It’s in my garage not being used unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Opperman

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I have medium size lawn that probably needs a bigger size mower BUT this little guy does a great job 90% of the time! Surprisingly powerful when used on tall and wet grass. I should (but won't) buy an extra battery (way too expensive). The rare occasion i let my lawn grow to high or if I need to cut it when wet (sometimes time constraints demand it's now or worse) I just wait the 3-4 hours i need to recharge the battery back full.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrard M. McCann

customer_reviews.title: 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this, Ignore the positive reviews. This thing(calling it a lawnmower is an Insult to actual lawnmowers) was a hassle to assemble with parts not lining up, stalls while at a stand still. I was so excited to have a battery mower and still am but now I'm going to save up to buy a model from a more reputable brand. Definitely wont be trusting sun joe ever again.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last yr, it worked well at first and I was really pleased. I had purchased a extra battery to make sure I could cut my entire lawn all at once vs. having to recharge. But unfortunately good experience changed it stopped working. After cleaning it several times it would turn on and then once I'd move forward it would stop. It became extremely frustrating as all the trouble shooting did not work. I called Amazon who directed me to the manufacturer who did nothing to fix the issue. Very disappointing as I am having to purchase a new lawnmower this year.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Battery says fully charged but mower won't work. Warranty says "ship it back prepaid". After I ship it back prepaid, if it's the battery, I have to buy a new battery. If it's not the battery, they will decide if they should fix it. This mower was used on a very small yard for a single season. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: C. R.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful small mower that is perfect or a small yard
customer_reviews.text: This mower is small, quiet, but does the job. It is perfect for a small lawn. It is a bit difficult to maneuver, but once I figured out how the mower works, I was able to make it do the job. Putting the mower together was a matter of tightening a few screws that hold up the handle. Simple. Charging the battery was easy. So was inserting it in the mower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad, but I was able to borrow it the other day and now I want one for myself! Works great, easy to use, we got his for $189 and that was worth the price to me! We has just planted our winter grass and it was really tall and this mower did a great job on it. We did manually clean out the bottom with our hands a few times because our grass was a little wetter then we thought it was, but it handled it well!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Maybe good for a tiny yard. Our yard isn't that big but we can't get it done in one battery and the grass bag hardly holds any grass, it takes more time to empty the bag than to actually mow, you have to empty it so often. And the power is unimpressive. Wish we could return it.
customer_reviews.author: kasnel

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent and is very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I already had a battery from the worthless snowblower, but getting a deal on the bare mower almost made up for it. The mower actually mows well and lasts a long time. Not very big, but my lawn only has patches that need to be mowed every few weeks (I'm soo lucky!) and this mower is soo convenient to use that I grab it for a quick 15 minute mow when I get home from work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N

customer_reviews.title: For a smaller lawn, it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Chose this one because I already have a Snow Joe snow thrower and I can use the batteries on this as well. I was able to mow my lawn on a single battery (I'm guessing a little larger than an 1/8th of an acre city lot). Once you get past the sound (more like a vacuum cleaner than a lawn mower when first started), it works just like it should. Operation was easy. My only gripe (a small one) is that the bag is rather small and takes a little bit to empty; otherwise, I would recommend if you have a small lawn and need a lighter mower to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Works great, quiet, and folds down to store away!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and we’ve had it for several months now. He loves this mower. We have a very tiny yard, so the 40ish minutes that the battery lasts is more than enough time for him to get our front yard mowed. It’s very quiet. I can barely hear it running if I am on the other side of the house (we have a 2000sqft one-story home). He only wishes the bag held more grass, but we knew it was smaller and bought it for its compact size and folding handle. We don’t have much room in our garage, so we fold it down and tuck it under his work table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent, small lawnmower - NO gasoline fumes, just fresh-cut grass and low noise!
customer_reviews.text: If you, like me, hate smelling fumes from your gasoline-powered lawnmower and/or hate noise that it makes, consider buying Sun Joe lawnmower. It's on the narrow side but does a great job cutting grass and is very light - most if its body is plastic, except the motor and battery. Speaking of battery, it lasted for at least 60 minutes cutting short grass. While it doesn't cover as much as 26" mower would in one pass, consider health benefits of not breathing in toxic fumes and extra walking outside to keep you in shape :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Starinsky

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless e-mower
customer_reviews.text: I have been dragging around a cord for way too long. Sometimes the idea of having to untangle the extension cord was enough to make me dread mowing. I searched and searched for the best cordless mower for the price and I am so glad I chose Sun Joe. With this, I can't wait to get out there. Excellent product, works well. Battery lasts over 45 minutes, I have done both front and backyard on the same charge, no problem. Also, the rechargeable battery can be used with the Snow Joe, which I will pick up soon too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: No discharge chute
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even used it yet, but on reading the instructions and assembling, I noted cheap plastic wheels and lack of discharge chute mentioned in third bullet on description. That means you must bag the grass and cannot mulch. Amazon paid for the chute which is available at an extra charge. I also bought a spare battery, and there is no storage on the mower for it. I will update when the batteries charge and I can see if it will mow grass.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower is awesome. My yard is 10,000ft and we used to have a landscaper mow with giant rider mows, leaf blowers, etc. We now mow ourselves. Just charge the battery push the button and go.. Took 5 minutes to remove blade and sharpen it with a file. It is nice to have a fresh sharp blade after 5-10 cuts. We can mow within an hour after a rain because its so light weight and doesn't leave ruts like a full sized mower. I can't stand the noise of a mowers and this mower is very quite. The neighbors will probably barley hear it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Good mower for a medium to small size lawn
customer_reviews.text: Don't let you grass get to tall. this thing is nice a quiet but it will get bogged down by wet, damp, or grass that is starting to get too high, so you will need to stay on top of your lawn work.
customer_reviews.author: Koa Beam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale in a bundle with the battery and charger. That's a good deal, as the batteries are $118 USD! I assembled it and was pretty excited to try it, so I put the battery only partly charged in and went outside. After not being able to start it I READ THE INSTRUCTIONS and found out what I was doing wrong. Even though my front yard (small, 18' X 20'), it was about 10 days overdue for mowing, this Sunjoe when through it like a champ. Very happy with its performance and nimbleness.
customer_reviews.author: Stafford Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely useless because the motor is too weak
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 2 years now and I can't use this any more. Even with a new battery with full charge, it cannot cut through my lawn. It's simply too weak to be useful. I bought a new blade and an extended battery but none of them make this thing usable. I ended up wasting more money by buying those stuff. Stay away from buying this. If you really care about the environment, get a powerful gas mower and finish the job quickly instead of producing chemical and plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Only leaving comments when something's wrong

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller yards.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to push. I put the handle up against my hip bones to push it as I have a shoulder problem and couldn't use the heavy gas mower anymore (even though it was self propelled.) I used to struggle with the gas mower as it would drag me all over the place. This mower is quieter, safer and you can push it at your own pace and take your time if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Shinjuku

customer_reviews.title: amazing piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I mow about 2 acres of grass and was looking for an easier way to trim around the house and deal with the hills that are unsafe with the riding mower. When I took it out of the box I thought it was a toy. All plastic and the only thing to assemble is fasten the two pieces of the handle together. It works great! Charged up in two hours and really weighs almost nothing. The only drawbacks are the catcher fills up fast (big weeds) and it isn't self propelled. But since its so light its easy to get up those hills. What a find.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Unusable. Arrived damaged AND won’t start.
customer_reviews.text: Unusable due to bent wheel. This needs a new axel (and wheels) but I can’t find a way to request one. This is going to be a pain to box up the whole thing up and ship back. One defective part means the whole mower is an expensive lawn ornament. UPDATE: this mower wont even start. The problem is more than just a bent wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. Good power
customer_reviews.text: Works good but handles for smaller mower did not fit together well. Possibly they were for larger machine. That being said, the first mow went well.
customer_reviews.author: BobB

customer_reviews.title: If you have a lawn - buy this.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a lawn - buy this mower. If you have a gas mower - get rid of it - and buy this mower. No gas cans. No spilling, leaking fuel. No smelly clothes after mowing. No carburetor adjustments. No air filter changes. No oil changes. No tune-ups. No gut-wrenching-hard-starting at the start of the season. No fuel stabilization at the end of the season. Extremely light weight and powerful. Mowing is no longer a chore. It's as easy as 'just walking'.
customer_reviews.author: joel michalik

customer_reviews.title: Works well but the handle stinks. There are two ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the handle stinks. There are two interlocking side wheels that stripped my first time using it and now the handle won't stand upright. Much prefer over the corded version though! The mulch bag is teeny tiny, won't handle much grass at all so I don't use it. Pay a little more for a bigger and sturdier mower.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Got It!
customer_reviews.text: My first battery mower but it's everything it is supposed to be and more. Much quieter than regular mowers and I love not having to use gas and oil! Cuts the grass very well and is easily maneuverable. It's turned out to be a perfect piece of equipment for my smaller yard. I did think I had a problem early on and contacted the "Sun Joe" number given. I never got an answer and left a couple of messages that went unanswered...??? I did find the answers I needed from a friend - kinda bummed the company didn't get back to me though.
customer_reviews.author: Zanne

customer_reviews.title: built way too low
customer_reviews.text: I started out with the mower set on level 3 but that tore up the turf, so I set it on 6 -- the highest level. Even with that it scalped my yard much shorter than I prefer. Even worse, however, is that the adjustment lever only lifts the front of the mower, so the back and the blade casing drag on the ground. The yard ended up spotted with areas of scraped-off grass. Either this particular one was put together wrong, or the whole design of the machine is off. I'll be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: mfro

customer_reviews.title: I love this little mower
customer_reviews.text: I have a small city lot, I was sick of getting gas that would go bad and having to smell like gas after I mowed. My shoulder would be out of place after having to pull the mower constantly to try and start it. This stops all that! My only complaint is that it mows too low. I believe in cutting your grass long so it stays healthier and this just does not adjust high enough, so for that I am taking away one star. Everything else about this is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: susie520

customer_reviews.title: Does the job of making lawn look great.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this lawnmower. After one use though he couldn't get it to start again. I had read some other reviews saying they had the same problem. But then he figured out he was doing something wrong and needed to push another button also, something like that, and he has never had a problem since. It's lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: renee r.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! No more gas smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mower. This replaced my 22" gas mower so it seems tiny in comparison BUT it's mighty. Amazingly quiet, easy to maneuver around obstacles, and extremely easy to start. Just grab the battery off the charger, pop it in, hold the start button and pull the lever and off you go! I've had a Snow Joe snow blower for about 4 years and I love that too (and I live in WI!). If you have a small to medium sized yard I highly recommend this. It surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Alanza Grawien

customer_reviews.title: I bought the Snow Joe, last winter, so ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Snow Joe,last winter,so impressed I bought this Sun Joe mower this spring.I have a large lawn and cut it with a Cub Cadet riding mower,but there are always areas to cut with a push mower.I just cut under our trampoline {it's anchored down because of the wind} the grass was about 8 inches tall,and wet,the mower HAD NO TROUBLE at all..Only complaint,the push handle locks in position, I had to leave it loose to go under the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Hard to push & cuts grass too short
customer_reviews.text: This cuts grass WAY too short even at highest setting. It is not self propelled. Impossible to push through the grass. I was switching from an old fashioned push mower and this is way harder to push through the grass. Came with bent wheels. No mulching option. Spend more money and buy a better electric mower.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Need a second battery
customer_reviews.text: I have a yard that is around .25 acres. This will mow about 60-70% of my yard before the battery dies. It will recharge in around an hour, but it can be frustrating. It’s still a great product, so much so that I purchased the weed eater from sun joe as well. I would buy again, but recommend buying a second battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jonni Kitchell

customer_reviews.title: you might get a lemon
customer_reviews.text: It would only start for 2 seconds then die... new out of the box, parts are cheap maybe I just happen to get the lemon defective lawnmower out of the whole warehouse. I don't know.. but if it won't work in the start then how long will it last. I won't be buying this brand again unless I see something different.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Would Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mower. It looks like a little toy. Being a small-framed woman, it’s very easy to use! The only downfalls are; my grass is thick, so it takes a lot out of the mower and runs the battery down faster, and the bag is small. However, those things are minor! Good product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Cuts only in a straight line.
customer_reviews.text: It assembled easily except the multi-position height adjustment quick lock wheel didn't mesh with teeth on the mower. I took it off and saw a L on the right side and a R on the left side. Switched it and it connected fine. The mower on the 2 lowest position stalled the motor. It can cut in a straight line. Since the front wheels are locked in place, it's difficult to turn.
customer_reviews.author: H. Takenaka

customer_reviews.title: Great mower! and the battery lasts a long time too...
customer_reviews.text: This mower works great! I am so DONE with messing around with small gas engines, constantly having to repair them and/or paying someone else to repair them. I don't have much grass to cut, so this mower was perfect for me. The battery lasts a good while, almost long enough for me to cut my whole lawn. But by the time the battery runs out I'm ready to take a break anyway. The BEST part though, is that I can now easily tell my kids to go cut the grass since they don't have to figure out how to get it started. And they're grateful when the battery runs out too... :-)
customer_reviews.author: Megara

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: We just received our lawn mower yesterday and it will not work we have talked to support three separate times and it still will not work..it will not work when you're in grass which is the whole purpose for buying it..outside when you buy a lawn mower for the convenience And it doesn't even work
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First use was great just like my other SunJoe products was excited about the thought of no more mower maintenance (gas, spark plugs, oil). Went to use second time a week later and when I went to start it; it began to smoke and then it blew up (sounded like a shotgun) red flash and then white smoke smelled electrical. Returning it very next day - Beyond Disapppointed !!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H - Florida

customer_reviews.title: It only last 10 mins!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's finally the time to mow the lawn. I was so excited to give it a first try. The mower is quiet, which is nice. It's not so powerful, which is still acceptable. However, a fully charged new battery can only last 10 mins. This is more than ridiculous. I would not recommend this garbage to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: You will be supported if a problem arises!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive customer service! I bought my unit this spring and it stopped working recently. I stand by my comment that this is probably not the right product for a very large yard like I have. However, a reasonably medium one that can be mowed in 30 or 40 minutes or less this is perfect for. I called and after reading some of the reviews here felt like it would be futile but they very quickly diagnose the problem and are sending me a new unit as well as the means to send my defective one back. I am super impressed with how they stand behind the product and really enjoy using it but wish I had a smaller yard.
customer_reviews.author: Big Asz T

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous light weight battery operated lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: Love (love love) this lawn mower. As a very petite and not particularly strong person, I find this lawn mower is a dream for my 1.5 acre yard. I didn't want the hassle of dealing with smelly, messy gas and love the low noise this mower emits. Because it's not self-propelled, it's a bit tricky to navigate on a steep hill in my background but, otherwise, does a beautiful job of mowing my yard. I almost look forward to my grass growing back so that I can mow again!
customer_reviews.author: MaineMomma

customer_reviews.title: light weight - easy to use - good cut
customer_reviews.text: At first I put the handles on upside down (watch for this😬 and it wouldn’t mesh with the “teeth” on the side of the mower. When I got it right, it worked like a dream. I need this light weight machine because I could not push my old gas mower.. and I wanted a more environmentally friendly footprint. The price was right and I have a clean cut :-).
customer_reviews.author: Carol Radinsky, DVM

customer_reviews.title: It's great! One caveat though...
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the size of your yard, I would consider purchasing an additional battery. The charge seems to last a solid 2 hours. However I was very impressed at how powerful this thing is. I cut my terribly overgrown lawn with significantly more ease than I ever did with the old gas mower.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: Works real nice.
customer_reviews.text: Its not a gas Mower so it isn't as powerful as one but It is great for my yard. If your one to let your lawn to get real long this isn't for you. It has plenty of power for a taken care lawn. The wheel's are very flimsy.I'm sure this is to keep it lite but I would rather have it a bit heaver with better wheels. The catcher is way too small. But all in all I like it. I guess I will just have to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Splatz

customer_reviews.title: Buy an extra battery
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's so light weight and easy to move. But you should definitely buy an extra battery since tge charge doesn't last that long. I have to cut half of my front yard then stop for like 2 hours to charge the battery again. Other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn Jopp

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Good for small yards and short grass, I was impressed with how quiet and easy to start it was. My 3 star rating is due to missing screws to connect the handles, having bent handles, and the battery takes 2 to 3 hours to charge and only lasts 30 to 45 minutes. I'm sending mine back and going to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: It was fairly simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Ok I was very curious about a cordless charger, and since this was under 200 bucks. I went for it.. Like the picture it is quite small, so for a big yard I dot recommend this, but for a small yard, then yes.. It is quick light weight and plastic, which I was not so pleased. This was like a child's toy.. Now it did do a fairly good cut, but watch the height of the blade will scalp your yard.. It is not noisy at all.... But for the price I guess you cant beat it.. But I am gonna settle on a regular 4 wheel drive self mower..
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin  Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Not bad at all for being battery powered.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I’ve had a gas mower for decades and swore I’d never go electric/battery powered. My Briggs powered mower finally gave up on me and I went with this. Cuts really good and the battery holds a charge well. I got two compete mows in a three week spand.
customer_reviews.author: Me. MoonLuna

customer_reviews.title: Light & easy
customer_reviews.text: Getting it out of the box was the hardest part! :) It’s so light that even this 63.5 yr old woman can mow her lawn!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca of SunnyBrook

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: After owning less than a yr...I stored it in a dry garage, the battery was stored in my mud room over the winter...the mower doesn’t work...piece of junk! Battery is fully charged, key is in, mower is cleaned and maintained...Can’t get support on the phone or to respond to email...don’t waste your $$!! Update: it has been 2 months...2 mowers...2 batteries and still do not have a working product!! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY THEY HAVE AWFUL CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY CONTINUE TO SEND PRODUCTS THAT DON’T WORK!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MKC

customer_reviews.title: avoid
customer_reviews.text: Change to original review. Don’t get. On second mower after first was replaced after a month. Shaft holding blade is now broken and have been on hold for over 2 hours-says a 5 minute wait-trying to deal with issue
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lawn mower through Amazon May 2019. It worked fine last summer. I stored it in a closed shed all winter. This spring, it won't run.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to walk behind.
customer_reviews.text: My husband really liked this mower. It is our second one though in less than 3 years. Thank goodness we bought an extended warranty. We are hoping this one lasts longer. The new extended warranty was twice the price of the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the adjustable lever raise and lower the blade better grass cutting. Very sturdy , easy to manuver. My dislike is the battery should last more than 40min. Therefore you need to recharge. Overall I love mu Sunjoe Mower.
customer_reviews.author: teegee

customer_reviews.title: My husband is 85 and I’m 83 we love it
customer_reviews.text: Set up was fast and easy .Nice looking unit great price also bought extra battery while Iam useing one the other is charging
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good Mower
customer_reviews.text: After mowing my front and back lawn on a single charge, I am very pleased with my Sun Joe Ion mower. I am only rating 4 stars because the mower can be used with or with out a grass bag. However you must purchase a discharge chute accessory to use the bag less option, this should have been included with the mower itself not an additional purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Laws

customer_reviews.title: Good little machine
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to take care of my 500 sq foot back lawn. If I had hillsides and acreage to mow I would get something more substantial but for my modest patch of grass this little 16 incher works just fine. Plenty of battery capacity. Good little machine. I'm a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: Old Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great mower, battery lasts 40 minutes as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, light weight and easy to use. However, the battery just doesnt seem to last long enough. I mow just about once a week and have a medium size backyard and front yard. If it hasn't rained recently (do the grass grows a little slower) then I can get through 1 of them on one charge. But if it's been more than a week or the grass has grown faster then the battery will die just past the halfway point, so about 30-40 minutes of mowing (as advertised). It then takes about 3 hours to charge. I've purchased a second battery and that has made all the difference but was an extra $100.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Cashion

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to landscaper/old gas mowers
customer_reviews.text: Our yard had been taken care of by a landscaper on a big, gas, riding mower for a few years. His prices kept going up, up, up...and for the medium sized yard that we have-that was ridiculous. I didn't want to be bothered with another heavy, gas mower that requires maintenance every year. I also didnt want an electric cord mower either. This mower is a real GEM. It's the perfect size. Cuts great. Battery pack works on several other easy to use yard 'toys'. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: John E. Walker

product_meta.title: Sun Joe iON16LM 40-Volt 16-Inch Brushless Cordless Lawn Mower, Kit (w/4.0-Ah Battery + Quick Charger), ION16LM
product_meta.description: Style:Kit (w/4.0-Ah Battery + Quick Charger)| Pattern Name:MowerMOW POWER TO YA! Ditch the gas, oil, noxious fumes, pull-cords, and extension cords and meet the newest addition to the iON tool series - the Sun Joe iON16LM cordless lawn mower! Powered by the same rechargeable 40 V iONMAX battery system, the iON16LM utilizes the most advanced lithium-ion technology to deliver up to 40 minutes of whisper-quiet runtime with zero carbon emissions for cleaner air. This cordless dynamo is also engineered with a powerful brushless motor for increased battery efficiency, optimal motor performance and extended motor life (up to 2000 hours! ) to keep your iON mowing strong season after season. Ideal for small to mid-sized lawns, the iON16LM starts instantly with a simple push of a button and its ergonomic handle maximizes user comfort during use. Its compact design features rugged front and rear all-terrain wheels that make it easy to maneuver in tight spaces. Quickly adjust the cutting height of your grass with the 6-position height adjustment lever, which tailors cutting heights from 1. 18 inches up to 3. 15 inches. The 9. 25-gallon grass bag conveniently detaches to dispose of grass clippings. The iON16LM is backed by a full two-year , is ETL approved, and Energy Star certified. GET EQUIPPED this spring with the Sun Joe iON16LM – the easy, convenient and cord-free way to care for your lawn. No Load Speed (rpm): 3500.
feature_bullets: No pull cords, gas, oil, tune-ups, carbon emissions or tangled extension cords
Powerful brushless motor increases battery efficiency, maximizes motor performance, decreases noise and vibration and extends motor life
Compact design ideal for small to mid-sized lawns. Cutting options - Bag and discharge chute
6-position height adjustment lever tailors grass cutting height from 1.18 to 3.15 Inch
ETL approved; Energy Star certified.Deck Material:ABS Plastic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,064 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
